summary: A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a young girl. When her life is threatened by her father's connection with crime, he must call upon his abandoned skills to save her.
cast: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Jacqueline Chan|Qinqin Li|Andy Lau|James Lee Guy|Tomer Oz|Dean Shek|Karl Maka|Hark Tsui|Biao Yuen|Eddie Peng|Jun Hu|Jia Song|Shaofeng Feng|Wah Yuen|Yiheng Du|Jiayi Feng|Lily Ji|Maksim V. Manylov|Ming-Tsai Wu|Bo Yuen|Qiu Yuen|Yuchen Zhu
title: Wo de te gong ye ye
